column1: # Exit: BUY to close (TP at 50% premium
# - Entry Order Type: Usually "limit at ask" for SELL to open
# - SL Multiplier: Stop loss multiplier (default: 2.0) or SL Premium %
# Optional Fields (uses config defaults if blank):
# - Target DTE: Target days to expiration (default: 45)
# - IV Rank Threshold: Minimum IV Rank % (default: 50)
# Note: Option selection is automated based on DTE
# The tool will automatically find matching put options that meet entry conditions
